Name: Cyber Skirmish
About the game: Welcome to the world of Cyber ​​Skirmish. A world of many clashes and fights for the 'Amperls' galaxy. Your mission is to save the galaxy from waves of enemies. However, this is not an easy task. There will be many enemies and many obstacles on your way. Use your tactics skills to survive this difficult period. You will get help from many generals who will help you and give you advice. Use your laser launchers to deal with the toughest opponents. There are 3 ships to choose from in the game. Each of them is different. Choosing the right ship will be very important in difficult levels. If you think you need a bigger challenge, you can change the difficulty level to a higher one. There are different obstacles in different levels that you have to overcome. We believe you can do it, pilot!
